```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
library(dplyr)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}

ler_dados <- function(arquivo){
  require("dplyr", warn.conflicts = FALSE)
  
  dados = read.csv(arquivo, stringsAsFactors = FALSE, encoding='UTF-8')
  return(dados)
}

speed_datings = ler_dados("../dados/speed-dating.csv")


df = speed_datings %>% mutate(diferenca_idade = abs(age_o - age))


```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}

ggplot(df, aes(x = attr, y = like)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.4)

ggplot(speed_datings, aes(x = fun, y = like)) + 
  geom_point(position = position_jitter()) + geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)


ggpairs(select(speed_datings, like, attr, intel, fun, age))

```
